
# Glossary

## By Title 

```{r,results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(pander)
library(knitr)

meta_data <- read.csv("02_songs_output/meta_data.csv") 

meta_data %>%
  arrange(title) %>%
  transmute(title = paste0("[",title,"](",label,")"),artist) %>%
  kable(escape = FALSE)
```

## By Artist

```{r,results='asis', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
meta_data %>%
  arrange(artist) %>%
  transmute(title = paste0("[",title,"](",label,")"),artist) %>%
  kable(escape = FALSE)
```
